title: Recent playstyle bugged
body:
I notice the new Recent Playstyle which shows a friend's most recently played champion, with the lane and role.  It's a nice addition, and it's neat that it shows the lane, but for some reason it's bugged for me.  It keeps showing the Support icon for my recent playstyle, when I haven't supported for over 20 games now.

What is the meaning of this?

(sorry if this is the wrong board, still not used to the new boards layout)

replies.body: Still broken... it still continues to mark me with the Support icon when I was a Mage.
Ok, now the LANE is bugged.  I was in mid lane for a good majority of last game, but it said I went bot lane.  And it's STILL showing that I was a support.  I was a MID LANE MAGE!
20 games since Recent Playstyle was added. Holy...

That was just telling my history, which means my recent games since the Recent Playstyle was added has never been a support.  And yet they still show me as support.

I didn't mean 20 games since Recent Playstyle, I meant my last 20 games overall, some of which are since Recent Playstyle was added.
Well that's odd, it just took the last game I had before Recent Playstyle was added (which was Urgot) and used that.
What I'm trying to say is, I haven't been playing support for so long, even my most recent game I was an AP Assassin, and yet it put the support icon instead of the mage icon.
